Main Quests

aka Character Arcs

  • Join the Vanguard Institute (Nyx and Sasha)
  • Join the Obsidian Syndicate (Sasha)
  • Figure out his past (Nyx)

Side Quests

completed side quests generate 2xp each

  • Save the water sprite's daughter

Potential Quests

  • Xit escaped from [the Tower] with Cimmeris' Skull and the owner wants it back. He has sent a Hollow after them which Sasha/Rhesus/Austin killed.
